name: Lynn Petersen
text: The FloraBama Lounge is an awesome place to visit.  If you love fantastic music, great food, an atmosphere of kindness and being a part of the Bama, this is your place to visit.  We are 'snowbirds' and have been coming back here for 5 years. Also, on Sundays, they have a great church service, "Worship on the Water". There are many singers/songwriters/musicians who play at different times and different places within the Bama Lounges.  Personally, I would book The Perdido Brothers with their current time slot, 4-8 on Tuesdays and Sundays. Why? Ever since they became The Perdido Brothers, they have been drawing in more people.  The locals and snowbirds really enjoy their music and the time slot helps bring in the people.  We stay at Phoenix X and we hear so many people mentioning how much they enjoy The Perdido Brothers. This is not a criticism of the other artists because they are fantastic but I feel people really enjoy the music of Rick Whaley, Jon Cook, Pat McCann and Jose Santiago.

name: Hanna Lowery
text: disgustingly rude employees

resp.text:
Hi Hanna - Thank you for taking time to let us know about your recent visit to the Flora-Bama. On behalf of our team, please let me start by extending my sincerest apologies for the treatment you received from some of our staff. We absolutely do not tolerate this sort of behavior from our employees, and I would like to get a little more info from you if possible. Can you tell me what day/time you were here, any sort of description of what they looked like and/or where in the Flora-Bama did this occur?
Please know your comments have been passed to upper management, as well as our Ownership Team, for further review and action and, any additional info you may have would be helpful so that we may address this with the appropriate staff. Again, I'm so very sorry this happened but I would love to try and make things right. Please feel free to reach out to me directly with any other info you have using the following email address: blakeli@florabama.com.
I hope to hear back from you soon - Blakeli Calvert, Marketing Manager Flora-Bama

They threw me out on a cold rainy night for no reason except I was being over served by there staff. They threatened to have me arrested and my girlfriend was inside and had no idea where I was for 2 hours. The staff is rude and I hope this bar burns to the ground. It's a Hoosier ass place. The security is terrible, as I was waiting for my girlfriend across the street in the gravel lot I was assaulted by Shawn Minzes.
he threw me on the ground and kicked me breaking my hand and proceeded to brutally kick me. So beware and we'll armed if your even considering going there in the off season. The place is for low life's we will never be back.

name: Cory Jermier
text: Group of 7 and my 62 year old father was our DD. Paid $5 cover but he was asked to leave his barstool since he wasn't drinking?? So even though you pay a cover to see live music,   you are only allowed to stand and can't sit unless you are drinking?  What a joke.

resp.text:
Hi Cory,
We very much appreciate your feedback in letting us know about your recent experience. On behalf of the Flora~Bama, I extend our sincerest apologies for this incident as that is not our policy. Would you be able to tell me what bar you were sitting at, and do you happen to remember who the bartender was? Any information would be helpful as we'd like to strongly address this situation immediately.
Thanks again Cory, and we hope to hear back from you soon.

Hi Ryan,
I'd like to apologize on behalf of us all for your recent experience. This is unacceptable and in no way any  representation of how our employees are trained. Can you give me any more information, like what day/night this occurred, which bar you were at, any description of the bartender? Your comments are being passed to upper management for review and action, so any additional info you have would be extremely helpful. If you'd prefer to email back privately please feel free to do so: blakeli@florabama.com. Again, our apologies to you and next time you're here please let me know so I can buy you a drink! Hope to hear back from you.

text: Screw this place, went there to eat lunch on a Tuesday and I got there taco Tuesday deal and I had stomach pains and bad diarrhea for the rest of the week.

resp.text:
Hi Jacob,
On behalf of the Flora-Bama team, I sincerely apologize for this happening as this is not our norm. Please know your comments have been passed to upper management for further review and action.  I’m not in the business of making excuses, so I won’t waste your time with them, but I’d rather take the time to apologize for catching us at “not our best” and see what I can do to make it up to you. Would you be willing to give us another shot? I’d be more than happy to get a gift card sent out so you all can come back and enjoy the experience you all were looking to have. If you're open to this, please feel free to send me your contact info to the email below and we'd be happy to get that in the mail today. Again, I sincerely apologize for the occurrence and we hope we can make this right.
Blakeli Calvert, Marketing
blakeli@florabama.com

text: Request Rebecca as a waitress if you can!!! we walked in closer to closing time but she was super sweet and still had the best attitude. Helped with recommendations on what to eat and everything!! Food was great and the loaded tots were to die for! definitely glad we chose to eat here on a trip and will for sure try to come again in the future!

name: Tom Taylor
text: Spent the afternoon there having drinks and listening to T-bone Montgomery.   Excellent music, great service, and cheap but good drinks.

name: Paige Dobbins
text: First time being at Flora-Bama. And it was AWFUL SERVICE.  Food was okay. We ordered appetizers and food and they came out at the exact same time. That was okay. But when it came to the bill we asked for it to be separate and our server only delivered 1 check. When we asked for it to be split and for a to go drink our server walked away, mid sentence, not allowing myself to finish. When I brought this up to the manager Jack, he proceeded to look at me and say that she was a new server and he was apologetic about how it was. Didn't ask myself if I still would want my to go drink. Nothing. It did not seem to bother him one bit about how our service was.  Will not be returning to this restaurant because of this.
